a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Share of GDP spent on education vs. share of expenditure
General government expenditure on education (current, capital, and transfers) shown as a percentage of total government
spending across all sectors and as a percentage of GDP.
Government expenditure on education as share of GDP
Expenditure on education as share of government expenditure
Data source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics via World Bank (2023)
